data.title: Environment Management Guwahati University
data.meta_description: Environment Management Guwahati University - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document outlines the course structure for an M.Sc. in Environmental Management. It includes the course codes, titles, credit allocation, and brief descriptions for courses offered across four semesters. Courses cover topics such as basics of the environment and its management, environmental biology, chemistry, pollution, sampling, modeling, impact assessment, and specific media such as air, water, and solid waste management. Practical and fieldwork components are also included. The total credits required to complete the degree are 1600.
